title: Shangri La
typeOfFood: Ovo, Chinese, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has a vegetarian section on the where the some dishes are vegan suitable or ask to omit egg. Includes ma po tofu, braised tofu with shitake mushroom, green beans with pickled vegetable, vegetable fried rice, and vegan sushi (vegan mayonnaise available for spicy tofu rolls). Staff will point to the vegan items on the all-day dim sum menu. Full bar and Wi-Fi.
